name: frameworkthreejs

scripts.setup: npm run setupDirectory && npm run addStyle && npm run move && npm run remove3D
scripts.setup3D: npm run setupDirectory && npm run addStyle && npm run move
scripts.setupDirectory: mkdir src\css src\js src\models src\textures framework\css framework\js framework\textures
scripts.addStyle: (echo body { & type tab.txt & echo background-color: white; & type tab.txt & echo margin : 0; & echo })> framework\css\style.css
scripts.move: move framework.js framework\js\framework.js && move CTABanner.js framework\js\CTABanner.js && move armoire.js framework\js\armoire.js && move products.js framework\js\products.js  && move modal.js framework\js\modal.js && move createScene.js framework\js\createScene.js && move table.js framework\js\table.js && move roof.jpg framework\textures\roof.jpg && move wall.jpg framework\textures\wall.jpg && move wood_floor.jpg framework\textures\wood_floor.jpg && move main.js src\js\main.js && move BannerStyle.css framework\css\BannerStyle.css  && move ModalStyle.css framework\css\ModalStyle.css
scripts.remove3D: echo '' > framework\js\framework.js && echo '' > framework\js\createScene.js && echo '' > framework\js\table.js
scripts.initialState: move framework\js\framework.js framework.js  && move framework\js\armoire.js armoire.js && move framework\js\products.js products.js && move framework\js\modal.js modal.js && move framework\js\CTABanner.js CTABanner.js && move framework\js\createScene.js createScene.js && move framework\js\table.js table.js && move framework\textures\roof.jpg roof.jpg && move framework\textures\wall.jpg wall.jpg && move framework\textures\wood_floor.jpg wood_floor.jpg && move src\js\main.js main.js && move framework\css\BannerStyle.css BannerStyle.css && move framework\css\ModalStyle.css ModalStyle.css && move framework\css\style.css style.css && npm run checkAndDelete && npm run updateDoc
scripts.delete: if exist src rmdir /s /q src && if exist node_modules rmdir /s /q node_modules && (if exist framework (echo Suppression du dossier framework... && rd /s /q framework || (echo Echec de la suppression automatique. Tentative avec m√©thode alternative... && del /f /s /q framework\*.* && rd /s /q framework))) && if exist package-lock.json del package-lock.json
scripts.updateDoc: documentation build framework.js --shallow -f md -o DOCUMENTATION.md && documentation build CTABanner.js -f md -o DOCUMENTATION_BANNER.md && documentation build modal.js --shallow -f md -o DOCUMENTATION_MODAL.md
scripts.deploy: npm run setupDirectory && npm run addStyle && npm run move && npm run install_three && npm run moveDocumentation
scripts.moveDocumentation: move DOCUMENTATION.md framework\DOCUMENTATION.md && move DOCUMENTATION_MODAL.md framework\DOCUMENTATION_MODAL.md  && move DOCUMENTATION_BANNER.md framework\DOCUMENTATION_BANNER.md && move .gitignore framework\.gitignore && move CHANGELOG.md framework\CHANGELOG.md && move README.md framework\README.md && move tab.txt framework\tab.txt && move package.json framework\package.json

author: Kishan Turpin <kishan.turpin@gmail.com>, Dylan Malaussena <dylan.malaussena@hotmail.fr>
description: This is a Three.js framework for creating 3D web application for TerraNumerica.
